column2: The Week in Pictures: Post-Impeachment Letdown Edition
column5: Impeachment—wasn’t that about five years ago? What will the Democrats do for an encore? How many times can you go to this well? Not even a great GameStop hearing can stop their game. The better come up with something—fast—or the media might get bored and start asking questions about Andrew Cuomo.             Unlike Jeffrey Epstein                                          Headlines of the week:                              And the next headline in the series will be: “GOP Sweeps to Landslide Victory in Dem-Destroyed Cities”                                     And finally. . .  Commenters who employ what we deem extreme vulgarity in a comment — “s***” “f***” “a*******” or one of their many variants — will be banned without further notice.  “Arise and take our stand for freedom as in the olden time.”

column1: Winston Churchill “Proclaim Liberty throughout All the land unto All the Inhabitants Thereof.”
